metadata.dc:author: de la Fuente, Juan Ramón
metadata.dc:description: Psychosis, dementias, anxiety, depression, suicide and suicide attempts, as well as psychiatric disorders associated to violence and poverty have increased the global burden of disease. Other related problems associated to special diets, body image, compulsive use of computers and mobile phones, and those frequently observed in migrants subjected to intense distress are reviewed as well. Information and communication technologies may have undesirable side effects affecting some individuals in their conduct and social interactions.
metadata.dc:title: Impactos de la globalización en la salud mental.
[The impact of globalization on mental health].
